description: A right-wing French magazine accused of racism apologises to black socialist MP Dani¨¨le Obono.
title: French magazine condemned for showing MP Dani¨¨le Obono as slave
title_page: French magazine condemned for showing MP Dani¨¨le Obono as slave - BBC News
maintext: "This image is an insult to my ancestors, my family and my political movement," she said, adding she was "more determined than ever to fight against #racism, for liberty, equality and fraternity" - repeating the most famous slogan of the French Revolution.
